body.ab: &<lb n="c56-0028__main__13"/> paid him a visit the same evening. <lb n="c56-0028__main__14"/> His manners in private were even <lb n="c56-0028__main__15"/> more mild <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>& attractive than in public. For <lb n="c56-0028__main__16"/> there was a certain dignity in his <lb n="c56-0028__main__17"/> manner during his lectures which <lb n="c56-0028__main__18"/> was replaced by the greatest <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0028__main__d2e5588"/>affabity<del eID="c56-0028__main__d2e5588"/><lb n="c56-0028__main__19"/> affability and kindness in his own <lb n="c56-0028__main__20"/> house. He heard <mdel>by</mdel>my little narration <lb n="c56-0028__main__21"/> concerning my studies with attention <lb n="c56-0028__main__22"/> smiled at the names of Cornelius <lb n="c56-0028__main__23"/> Agrippa and Paracelsus<metamark>X</metamark> but without <lb n="c56-0028__main__24"/> the contempt that Mr Krempe had <lb n="c56-0028__main__25"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0028__main__d2e5622"/>Ex<del eID="c56-0028__main__d2e5622"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0028__main__d2e5627"/>exhibited<del eID="c56-0028__main__d2e5627"/>expressed to them. <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">^</metamark><lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__2"/> He said that <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__3"/> these were <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__4"/> men to whose <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__5"/> indefatigable zeal <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__6"/> modern<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0028__left_margin__d2e5670"/>chem<del eID="c56-0028__left_margin__d2e5670"/>natural<lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__7"/>philosophers were <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__8"/> indebted for most <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__9"/> of the foundations <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__10"/> of their knowledge<lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__11"/>it is not a meaner <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__12"/> taskThey<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>hadleft to <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__13"/> us, as an easier <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__14"/> task to give new <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__15"/> names, & arrange <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__16"/> in conected classi<lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__17"/>fications the <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__18"/> facts which they <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__19"/> to a great degree <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__20"/> ha<mdel>v</mdel>d<mdel>e</mdel> been the <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__21"/> instruments of <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__22"/> bringing to light. <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__23"/> The labours of <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__24"/> men of genius <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__25"/> however erroneously <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__26"/> directed scarce<lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__27"/>ly ever failed.<lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__1"/>in ultimately <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__2"/> turning to the <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__3"/> solid advantage of <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__4"/> mankind.I listen<lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__5"/>ed to his state<lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__6"/>ment which <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__7"/> was delivered <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__8"/> without any <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__9"/> presumption <lb n="c56-0028__left_margin__10"/>& then added<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0028__main__d2e5825"/>I ended by saying<del eID="c56-0028__main__d2e5825"/> that <lb n="c56-0028__main__26"/> his lecture had removed my prejudice <lb n="c56-0028__main__27"/> against modern chemists
